description: This Java class 'WikiParseService' provides functionality to parse Wikipedia pages, extract the page title, and identify internal links while filtering out non-content namespaces. It validates that URLs are HTTPS and originate from wikipedia.org, fetches the page using Jsoup, and processes the DOM to return deduplicated, ordered URLs of internal links.

classes.name: WikiParseService
classes.description: Service class responsible for fetching and parsing Wikipedia pages to extract titles and internal links.

classes.name: WikiParseService.ParsedResult
classes.description: Data transfer object for the parsing result, including page title and list of internal links.

classes.name: WikiParseService.WikiParseException
classes.description: RuntimeException subclass indicating errors during URL validation, fetching, or parsing.

methods.name: parse
methods.description: Main method to validate URL, fetch the page, and extract the title and internal links.

methods.name: validateWikipediaUrl
methods.description: Validates that the URL uses HTTPS and belongs to wikipedia.org.

methods.name: extractTitle
methods.description: Extracts the page title, preferring the firstHeading element or falling back to the document's title.

methods.name: extractInternalLinks
methods.description: Extracts, normalizes, filters, and deduplicates internal Wikipedia links from the DOM.

methods.name: isExcludedNamespace
methods.description: Checks whether a given path segment belongs to an excluded namespace.
